mapper.select: select distinct m.menu_id, m.parent_id, m.menu_name, m.url, m.visible, ifnull(m.perms,'') as perms, m.target, m.menu_type, m.icon, m.order_num, m.create_time from menu_info m left join role_menu rm on m.menu_id = rm.menu_id left join user_role ur on rm.role_id = ur.role_id left join role_info ro on ur.role_id = ro.role_id where ur.user_id = #{userId} and m.menu_type in ('M', 'C') and m.visible = 0 AND ro.status = 0 order by m.parent_id, m.order_num
